insert into t_project (id, product_id, user_id, time, amount, title, apr, join_max, period, loan_schedule, lock_time, expire_time, join_count, full_time, has_invested_amount, status, income, break_amount, loan_amount, min_join_amount, mer_bid_no, service_order_no, trust_order_no, pre_show_time ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinMax,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{period,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loanSchedule,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{expireTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{joinCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fullTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{hasInvestedAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{income,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{breakAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{loanAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{minJoinAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merBidNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{serviceOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trustOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{preShowTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
